result.eng: What will be on the television tonight?
result.ga: Céard a bheas ar an teilifís anocht
result.orig: Céard a bheas ar an teilifís anocht
result.html: Céard a bheas ar an teilifís anochtWhat will be on the television tonight?
result.ponchtml: Céard a ḃeas ar an teilifís anoċtWhat will be on the television tonight?

result.eng: There will be a special edition, the last show of the season.
result.ga: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúir
result.orig: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúir
result.html: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúirThere will be a special edition, the last show of the season.
result.ponchtml: Eagrán ar leiṫ a ḃeas ann seó deireanaċ an tséasúirThere will be a special edition, the last show of the season.

result.eng: When will you be leaving An Cheathrú Rua?
result.ga: Cén uair a bheas tú ag fágáil na Ceathrún Rua

result.eng: When will the festival be happening?

result.html: Cén uair a bheas an fhéile ar siúlWhen will the festival be happening?

result.eng: What time will the show be on TG4?

result.eng: What time will you be leaving?
result.ga: Cén uair a bheas tú ag imeacht
result.orig: Cén uair a bheas tú ag imeacht
result.html: Cén uair a bheas tú ag imeachtWhat time will you be leaving?
result.ponchtml: Cén uair a ḃeas tú ag imeaċtWhat time will you be leaving?

result.eng: He is the teacher that will be coming with us.
result.ga: Is é an múinteoir a bheas ag tíocht linn
result.orig: Is é an múinteoir a bheas ag tíocht linn
result.html: Is é an múinteoir a bheas ag tíocht linnHe is the teacher that will be coming with us.
result.ponchtml: Is é an múinteoir a ḃeas ag tíoċt linnHe is the teacher that will be coming with us.

result.eng: We are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.
result.ga: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hocht
result.orig: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hocht
result.html: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hochtWe are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a ḃeas ar siúl anoċt ag a hoċtWe are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.

result.eng: People will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ga: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.orig: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.html: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ scéalaíoċt ar an rud a ḃeas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.

result.eng: When I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ga: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.orig: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.html: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfiḋ mé fá do ċoinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.

result.eng: There's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ga: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.orig: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.html: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
